title: You can very easily tell what kind of person you are
body:
By how long you stay on Taliyah's title screen.
If you log in immediately with music disabled, you're probably a person that hates the human race.
If you listen to the whole thing once, you love society.

replies.body: yep you got me right on the head. i also have animations disabled. fuck the human race all scum.
I loved the login screen and the music, but I hate the society ;-;

The human race is a scourge upon this world.
They should all be dead, or rather UNDEAD!

Well you got me pegged well. 

People, what a bunch of bastards.

Ive heard the whole thing....



....and I hated it. Every bit.
I once had the login thing on while doing other things, and I didn't even notice that my regular music stopped and was replaced with the song. It took me at least 5 minutes to notice.
I just search that later on youtube ._.
Just listened to her log in music 4 loops in a row and when I opened this and read it the 5th loop was starting. :D
I turned it off because I wouldn't play the game if it was on. have it play in the background when I play. where does that put me?

> [{quoted}](name=macromite,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=OsVvZnPq,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-05-22T00:05:28.406+0000)
>
> I turned it off because I wouldn't play the game if it was on. have it play in the background when I play. where does that put me?

well since you do listen to it, you arent a society-hating freak.
I want a CD or compilation of login themes. Loved Sol's, Taric's, Taliyah's, Braum's, and the Bilgewater one.
What about me? I have music off because it lags my pc, but I listen to Taliyah's theme on my phone via youtube. ;-;
What if i just love the music? ._.
why is that?  I haven't had music enabled for ages.... I can't even tell you what the log in screen looks like
